text:
The [[Lhazaar|Lhazaar Principalities]] legend of the Ship of Bones claims that the evil [[death knight]] Prince [[Moren]] of the [[Bloodsails]] was cursed for his use of dark magics, and now he sails the [[Lhazaar Sea]] in his skeletal ship with a crew of [[undead]] pirates in search of living sailors on which to feed. It is said that on nights when two
or more moons are full, the Ship of Bones slides silently
over the waves to attack hapless vessels unlucky enough to
cross its path.
title: Ship of Bones
